data.name: Secrets For Taking
data.detailed_description:
Secrets For Taking is a game about, well, taking one's darkest and deepest secret.


Do you think you can take everyone's secret?
Do you think you can save this before time runs out?

After a strange encounter, Mash is put into a situation where he must traverse through a mysterious world with the mission to take everyone's secret! ...However, someone wants to make sure he can't achieve this. A rampant Magic-User is planning to do something—that if fulfilled—will cause chaotic and reality-breaking chaos!

Mash, and some allies that join later, will have to work to persevere and succeed...! You'll have to take a lot of secrets and—perhaps—save the world?


Be careful though! Whatever you do don't...l̵̨̧̛̥̮̬̲͙͓̫̗̘̽̆͑̎̐͝͝͝ͅͅi̷̻̖̙͍̯̣̠͔̜̾͂̽̈́̅̐̓͆́͛̅̕s̴̙̫̖̺̺͚̻͖͔̞̺̻͚̀̍̀̌͋̋͆́̐͗̒̏͊̚͠t̴͚̥̥̻̑͗̑̇̌͆̆̈́̍̓͋e̸̝͈͉͖̪̤̙̭͗̓n̷̯͈̹̗̘̯̩̙͊̍̅͌̀͛̎̑̕̕̕̚̚̚ͅ ̴͈̝͕͔̦̩̬̱̺͒͒͐̎̈́̽́̚͝t̴͚̠̟͈̫̮̜̗̜͕̗̯͐̈́͗͗̉̿̌͌͆̈́̉͝͝o̷̧̬͓̰͚͇̩͇̮̺͉͈̠̦͈̿́̿̄͛̉̈̋͂̕͝ ̸̛͕̝̞̟̣̳͓͎̺̟͈̀͐̿̆̆̿H̵̞̼͙̠̒̿̏̿̊͛̆͒̈̐͋͝ͅI̷̛̳̱͖̼͙͈͑̍̈́́̂͋̽̑̀̒̆͠M̸̧̠̭̭̺͕̼̙͓̄͂̾̅̒̉͆̋̐̊͋̆̈́͘͘. If you do, who knows what'll happen!


So do you think that...
You can take everyone's secret?

Features


  • A game that breaks the fourth wall in an interesting way!
  • Journey through a new world with its new, beautiful, and mysterious locations!
  • Enjoy a beautiful story and (hopefully) nice soundtrack!
  • A relationship between the Player and the characters within the game.
  • Fight enemies with different abilities and stats, making every fight feel fresh.
  • A creative, fun, bullet-dodging system.
  • Have a party where you the player lead Mash with some of his allies.
  • Other fantastic gameplay mechanics that make the game fun.
  • Make choices that maybe affect the story? (I don't know, do your choices MATTER in the first place!?)
  • Level and Currency systems.
  • A moderately challenging game, that gets harder as it goes on!
  • And taking a lot of Secrets!

[Warning: This game contains flashing lights, patterns, and images; some people may experience seizures when exposed to such. Please be careful.]
[Another Warning: This game is not a horror game, but parts of the game may cause paranoia and fear to you.]

FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)


  • What's the game about?
    You take secrets. It's in the name. (Seriously. This is one of the most common questions about the game.)
  • How long will the game be?
    The DEMO will be 15-30 minutes long. While the full game will be 2-3 hours long.
  • Wait, what's this game about again?
    YOU TAKE SECRETS. It's that simple.
  • When will the DEMO come out?
    This summer. (Somewhere around August to be specific)
  • On a scale of 1 to 10, how difficult is the game?
    The game isn't really that difficult. It's challenging enough to make you stay intrigued. So, maybe a 6.
  • Why and how is the Player involved within the story?
    You'll have to play and find out! :)
  • Okay, but, what's the game about again?
    I'm done with this FAQ!!!

Wishlist

Go Wishlist Secrets For Taking now! You'll be notified of when the Game is available!

data.short_description: The 4th-Wall Breaking RPG where You try to take everyone's darkest secret. However, a secretive force will intervene.
data.reviews:
“WOW! This game is amazing. Whoever made this game is talented, funny, and is a genius.”
100/100 – M3X

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Xp, Vista, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: You don't really need much to run this game. A literal microwave can run this game.
